tryon.welcomeDesc: Upload your photos and jewelry images to experience virtual try-on
tryon.howItWorksDesc: Follow these steps to complete your virtual try-on
tryon.jewelryPhotoDesc: Upload the jewelry you want to try on
tryon.importantDesc: Please ensure clear front-facing photos and jewelry images
tryon.uploadFaceDesc: Please upload a clear front-facing photo
tryon.missingImagesDesc: Please upload jewelry and face images
tryon.downloadSuccessDesc: Image has been saved to your device
tryon.jewelryUploadedDesc: You can continue to upload more jewelry images
tryon.faceUploadedDesc: You can continue to upload model reference images
tryon.modelUploadedDesc: You can continue to upload more reference images
tryon.uploadPrompt: Please upload jewelry and face images to generate try-on effect
tryon.clickGenerate: Click the generate button to start creating try-on effect
